prompts: Create a Pokemon that has a wolf-like appearance with metallic armor and a sleek tail.
I want a creature resembling a chimeric beast, combining elements of various animals and technology.
Generate a Pokemon design that features a mix of earthy and metallic colors, symbolizing strength and resilience.
Make a four-legged Pokemon that embodies the spirit of both nature and machinery.
Imagine a creature that has a unique helmet-like headpiece and a strong, muscular body.
Design a Pokemon with a blend of brown, gray, and teal colors, showcasing a powerful presence.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a guardian of the forest, with a mix of organic and synthetic traits.

distinctive_features: Metallic helmet-like structure on the head
Armored body with a sleek build
